dataset_pseudo_generator module¶

dataset_pseudo_generator.similar_set_spacy(model, word_list, max_similar_amount=100)[source]¶

Return the List of similar words using the spacy model and suggested word_list

Args:
model (spacy model object): The spacy model word_list (list): The list of suggestive words max_similar_amount (int): The maximum number of words to look for
Returns:
dataset (list): list of similar words
